snippet: The New York Times Company said its fourth-quarter drop in print and digital ad revenue was smaller than declines earlier in 2013.
abstract: New York Times Company reports fourth-quarter net income of $65.6 million, or 41 cents per share, down from $178.1 million, or $1.15 a share, one year earlier; says it added digital subscribers and slowed declines in print and digital advertising revenue.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times Company said its fourth-quarter drop in print and digital ad revenue was smaller than declines earlier in 2013.

headline.main: Times Co. Reports Slower Decline in Ads
headline.print_headline: Times Co. Reports Slower Decline in Ads
